name: sign-up
description: This is a landing page created by using React.js (version: 0.1.0) and Vanilla CSS. It has Login.js, ForgotPass.js, Next.js, Reset.js, and Signup_Google.js components. The user can create an account by entering their name, email, and setting a password. They can also sign up with Google, reset their password using reCAPTCHA for human verification, and log into an existing account.
author: Anvi Bhople
